title: Cloud native applications
body: Cloud native is a term of increasing importance in the development world. Cloud native refers to 'the concept of building and running applications to take advantage of the distributed computing offered by the cloud delivery model' (Oracle, n.d.).

title: Middleware
body: Middleware is an important concept for beginner developers to understand. Middleware. Williams (2022) describes middleware as 'Middleware is a layer of software that acts as a go-between for data and the user interface of any web application or website'.

title: Where to start: the Edx Bootcamp Experience
body: The Edx Bootcamp experience of learning full stack development took a certain shape to ensure that learners had a wide understanding.
